data.name: DeoVR Video Streaming
data.description:
Welcome to the beautiful world of DeoVR videos. Our world-class VR video player works seamlessly with all popular headsets. DeoVR combines intuitive design with the very latest features, showcasing the power of virtual reality at its very best. 

Other VR players don’t come close. Here’s why:
More advanced features than any other player: passthrough, haptics, loops, playback speed, build-your-own-journey, subtitles, and much more!
Regular updates to keep you at the cutting edge of VR tech
Hub for the world’s best VR content, including thousands of free VR videos
True-to-life visuals, capable of all resolutions and formats (180°/360°/2D/3D/8K/fisheye & more!)
User-friendly: play content with a single click, automatically chooses correct settings
Playback supports DLNA, web streaming, AND local files
Completely customizable: adjust every element for your unique preferences
Player is free for all users

deovr.com
Forum: forum.deovr.com
Blog: deovr.com/blog
Send any questions or feedback to support@deovr.com. We’d love to hear from you.

changelog.change_log:
New features:
  - Added views count on thumbnails.
  - Added Sandbox filter for videos.
  - Added Startup URL setting.
Improvements:
  - Quest 3 now preserves refresh rate between app restarts.
  - Meta account linking.
  - UI adjustments.
Bugfixes:
  - All resolutions now work with Oculus Link.

#New features:
  - Enabled linking Meta store and DeoVR subscriptions.
#Improvements:
  - Video pause when headset is taken off.
#Bugfixes:
  - Fixed controller vibration issue when moving player interface.
  - Several cases of app freezing resolved.
  - Pico4 screenshot now working.

New Features:
  Added the option to clear the browser history & cache when exiting the app.
Bugfixes:
  Fixed the notification pop-up issues that would occur in some cases.
  Removed the incorrect error message when enabling the microphone permission.

New Features: 
- The video timeline on DeoVR now includes a watchtime graph. 
- Added the option to autoplay videos on DeoVR. 
Improvements: 
- Alpha packing is now available for all DLNA videos. 
Bugfixes: 
- Fixed the missing info tab for some videos.
- Fixed the player flashing when switching between videos.
- The storage permission prompt now appears when opening the file browser.
- Fixed the Mistika URL history not functioning correctly.

New Features: 
- The video timeline on DeoVR now includes a watchtime graph. 
- Added the option to autoplay videos on DeoVR. 
Improvements: 
- Alpha packing is now available for all DLNA videos. 
Bugfixes: 
- Fixed the missing info tab for some videos.
- Fixed the player flashing when switching between videos.
- The storage permission prompt now appears when opening the file browser.
- Fixed the Mistika URL history not functioning correctly.
- Addressed thumbstick compatibility problems on Quest 3 with Quest Link.

New Features:
	- Support for Deo short-links

Improvements:
	- Support for more global alphabets. (Arabic, Ethiopian, Hebrew,...)

Bug fixes:
	- Fixed screenshot brightness
	- Fixed scrolling sometimes not working correctly
	- Custom playback speed is now saved for each video
        - Fixed settings not loading correctly for local videos

New Features:
	- Support for Deo short-links

Improvements:
	- Support for more global alphabets. (Arabic, Ethiopian, Hebrew,...)

Bug fixes:
	- Fixed screenshot brightness
	- Fixed scrolling sometimes not working correctly
	- Custom playback speed is now saved for each video

New Features:
	- Support for streaming subtitles.

Improvements:
	- Support for many global alphabets. (all European alphabets, all flavors of Cyrillic, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Armenian, Georgian, Thai & Malayalam)

New Features:
	- Passthrough:
		- It is now possible to select colors to keep instead of exclude from the video.
	
Improvements:
	- Improved the UI of certain panels.
	- Due to Quest updates a new permission is required to delete files.
	
Bug Fixes:
	- Vertical and horizontal offset now affect both eyes instead of just the right eye
	- Fixed next/previous button in the video player not working in certain situations.
	- Fixed video downloads from legacy websites.

New Features:
- It is now possible to select up to 3 different colors for passthrough.

Bug fixes:
- Reverted the range and falloff sliders back to 0-1000.

Bug fixes:
- Set as defaults wrong behaviour
- Changing resolution failed
Improvements:
- Passthrough:
  - Colored sliders making it much easier to understand which colour you are setting
  - Slider ranges adjustment allowing more precision
- B-Button - Behaviour is reverted to 13.6
- Player transform settings - Yaw and Roll correct names

Bug fixes:
- Brightness causing visual artifacts on video switch

Bug fixes:
- Fixed high bitrate videos crashing
- Fixed various UI issues

Improvements:
- Passthrough:
  - Extended our fisheye layout, so Studios can take advantage and prepare videos with alpha channel - taking passthrough experience to next level
- UI:
  - App remembers active tab in player panels
  - 'Drag video' function was renamed to 'Dome rotation' and got extended, it can consider controller banking rotation and rotate the dome accordingly (in Global settings / Player or in Player settings there's a new option for “Dome rotation with roll”)

New Features:
- Introduced categories and filters to DeoVR.com website

Bug fixes:
- Fixed incorrect values of image settings
- Fixed sorting of videos and adjusted visuals of sort
- Fixed various UI issues

Improvements:
- Keyboard:
  - Now has input field on top to more easily edit typed text
  - Added a shortcuts to most used email addresses
- Updated visuals of message box panels
